about_me.des: I am a Machine Learning / Data Mining / Data Analysis developer. Proficient in Go, Python, R and Java languages

projects.saplatform: This course provides a broad introduction to machine learning, datamining, and statistical pattern recognition
projects.jalpc: Kaggle challenge. Predict survival on the Titanic using Python, R & Random Forests
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.nextcode_des: Data Manager in Labs team. Machine Learning, Data Mining and Data Analyses tasks
career.ucloud_des: Java developer for leading provider of innovative broadband solutions that deliver video, voice and data to communications providers around the world.
career.college_des: July 2016 - Gradution from NTUU KPI, Information Networks and Systems
career.college_des2: Oct 2016 - Start Master degree in Computer Science TU Dresden, Germany
